author: Warhammer
description:
Jake has requested a helping hand on how to paint some faces, and Dan has answered the call! We’ll be going through painting a couple of skin tones and even their tiny eyes!

Dark Skin Tone
Base Paints
Catachan Flesh
Dryad Bark

Layer Paints
Baneblade Brown
Doombull Brown
Gorthor Brown

Technical Paints
Lahmian Medium

Pale Skin Tone
Layer Paints
Cadian Fleshtone
Flayed One Flesh
Ulthuan Grey

Contrast Paints
Volupus Pink

Technical Paints
Lahmian Medium 
Contrast Medium

 If you're new to painting, our Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.
Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/

- Get Warhammer in your inbox: https://ow.ly/6SJq50T3NL1
title: Getting better at Painting Warhammer Faces?! | Warhammer
